mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , (SELECT D.ID FROM MEMBERS D WHERE D.ID = A.MEMBERS_ID AND D.MASTER='N') AS MEMBERS_ID , (SELECT C.IMG_NAME FROM IMG C WHERE C.PRODUCT_ID = B.ID AND C.R_IMG = 'Y') AS IMG_NAME , A.PRODUCT_ID , B.SUBJECT , B.PRICE , A.PURCHASE_DATE FROM PURCHASE_HISTORY A LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_BOARD B ON A.PRODUCT_ID = B.ID WHERE A.MEMBERS_ID = #{members_id}
